description: Rating Action: Moody's affirms Sustainable Communities for Leeds (Finance) PLC s rating and maintains stable outlookGlobal Credit Research - 11 Mar 2022London, March 11, 2022 -- Moody's Investors Service (Moody's) has today affirmed the underlying rating of A3 on GBP102 million senior secured bonds due 2032 (the Bonds) issued by Sustainable Communities For Leeds (Finance) PLC (the Issuer).  The outlook remains stable.The Issuer is the funding vehicle for Sustainable Communities for Leeds Limited (SC4L).RATINGS RATIONALEThe A3 underlying rating on the Bonds reflects as positives (1) ProjectCo's satisfactory performance since SC4L began providing Facilities Management (FM) services in September 2013, with minimal levels of actual financial deductions incurred; (2) the long term Project Agreement (PA) with Leeds City Council (the Council); (3) the availability-based revenue stream under the PA (4) the simple nature of the FM obligations, comprising (a) reactive and planned maintenance, and (b) cleaning of communal areas for residential housing.
